summary: Ever thought it was a waste that once you finish Dawnguard after siding with the vampire hunters that there was a huge castle going to waste? This mod changes that!
descriptionHtml:
*I AM CURRENTLY LOOKING FOR HELP FROM SOMEONE WITH BETTER SCRIPTING ABILITIES THAN MYSELF TO ADD IN NPCS (SUCH AS GUARDS, MAGE, SMITH ETC) AND HELP FINISH THIS MOD. I ALSO APOLOGISE FOR MY SLOW SPEED IN UPDATING THIS MOD AS I AM CURRENTLY WINDING DOWN MY STUDIES FOR MY PRACTICAL PHASE AT SEA (WHERE I WILL BE UNABLE TO WORK ON MODS DUE TO WORKLOAD AND A LACK OF INTERNET CONNECTION).*

This is my first mod and overhauls the Volkihar castle to being a worthy home for the Dragonborn!Â 

In its current state you should only install this AFTER COMPLETING DAWNGUARD. Because reasons.

Fleshes out and redecorates the interior of the Volkihar Castle, and turns the cathedral into a vault for all your display and storage needs! Adds various displays and mannequins throughout the castle and Npcs such as maids and a bard. Plenty of room for followers and fully navmeshed. Requires Dawnguard, Hearthfires and Dragonborn.

As it stands currently this mod consists of:

-Renovated and re-imagined Great Hall
-Renovated Smithy with smelter, forge, leatherworking stand, workbench and grinding wheel
-Renovated and re-imagined Wizarding Quarter with alchemy, enchanting and staff enchanting stations
-Cleaned and redesigned kitchens with two maids
-Cleaned and chilled Castles Stores
-Tranquil Private Quaters, complete with its own interior garden, Lab and four poster bed
-Follower/guard quarters with 6 beds
-a new secret area/bolt hole with displays and a mannequin (check the wardrobes!)
-A re-imagined cathedral, now as a museum/vault with extensive displays and mannequins

there are currently 24 mannequins and many more weapon displays throughout.

In the future I hope to add a castle blacksmith, court wizard and guards, aswell as makin the changes only occur when Harkon is defeated.
author: Eldaryn
